update c_code_value
code_type = #{codeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code_code = #{codeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
meaning = #{meaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enabled_flag = #{enabledFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sync = #{sync,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: /*CodeValueMapper.getSourceByDesc*/ SELECT code_code FROM c_code_value WHERE description = #{description}

from c_code_value where code_type = #{code_type} and enabled_flag = 'y'
